title: Policy Version
description: A specific version of a policy

isFirst.description: If known, whether or not this version is the first version of its policy.

name.description: The name of this version of the policy

id.description: A generated ID string used to construct a unique URL for versions without a name

duration.description: When this version of the policy was in effect

provenance.description: The details of origin of the information related this version of the policy

files.description: A list of files containing the contents of this version of the policy

notices.description: Any notices attached to this policy version
